objects.text:
• Premium rose gold plated material
• Delicate double-layer heart design
• Sparkling cubic zirconia crystals
• Hypoallergenic for sensitive skin

product_details.name: Enchanting Rose Gold Heart Collection - Double Layer Necklace Set
product_details.description:
• Premium rose gold plated material for elegant, long-lasting shine
• Delicate double-layer design featuring heart motifs and clover pendant
• Studded with sparkling cubic zirconia crystals for luxurious sparkle
• Adjustable chain length for versatile styling options
• Perfect layered necklace combination for romantic occasions
• Intricate filigree pattern in four-leaf clover design
• Hypoallergenic materials suitable for sensitive skin
• Comes in elegant gift packaging
• Modern and feminine design suitable for daily wear
• Includes both heart chain and clover pendant necklaces

banner_details:
The banner features a refined and feminine design, promoting a rose gold double-layer necklace. It includes a prominent headline (`heading`) in an elegant serif font, followed by a bold subheadline (`subheading`) in modern sans-serif to highlight the product type. The `description` text block lists the product features in bullet points aligned to the left. A light cream-pink abstract background and curving lines add a delicate frame around the content. The `product_image` is placed on the right half, balancing the text. The `price`, next to the `tagline`, is bold and prominent, followed by a contrasting rectangular `cta_background` with a clear call-to-action `cta` in white.

**Color Palette:**
- Cream Pink: #FFF1EE
- Light Rose: #FBE6E2
- Rose Gold: #D27B75
- Deep Rose: #B04A44
- Chocolate Brown: #613330
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features an elegant rose gold necklace with a heart and clover motif, creating a romantic and luxurious aesthetic. The primary color is a lustrous **rose gold (#B76E79)**, used for the chain and heart outlines, blending seamlessly into **white diamond accents (#FFFFFF)** within the hearts. These diamonds offer high contrast and highlight the intricacy of the design. The metal's subtle pink hue balances warmth and elegance, while the **soft shadow gray (#EAEAEA)** background keeps focus on the jewelry. This palette is ideal for a banner using soft peach tones, blush pinks (#F7CAC9), and champagne gold (#E9CBA7) to evoke sophistication and charm.
